price: ߊ߬ ߦߴߊ߬ ߢߣߊ߫ ( ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫ ) ߟߋ߫ ߓߊ߬ ߞߏ߫ ߝߏߦߌ߬ ߕߍߣߊ߬ ߛߋ߫ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߋ߬ ߟߊ߫؟
arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ أَحَدٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: ayaḥsabu an lan yaqdira ʿalayhi aḥadun
